summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Licensing and regulation of Towing services, adding a new chapter to be designated as Chapter 7 to the New License Code, (Ordinance 108934), and repealing Ordinance 90535 as amended by Ordinance 90316, 91141, 92986, 97331, 99869, 101488, 102631, and 104849, relating to regulating and licensing the business of vehicle wrecker and towing service.
